sentences.en: I am seeking clarification of the regulations.
sentences.cn: 我正在努力弄清楚这些规则。

sentences.en: For three-year-olds, for reasons that are still in need of clarification, no improvement—rather a slight drop in performance resulted from the change.
sentences.cn: 对于三岁的孩子来说，由于一些原因，他们的成绩并没有得到改善，只是因为改变而略有下降。

sentences.en: The second one needs some clarification.
sentences.cn: 第二项承诺需要进行一些说明。
